# lis

> life's short, avoid stupid duplicate coding.

`lis` a python library including vairous state-of-art tools, enjoy!

## Install

```
pip install lis
```

## Import

```
# import all
import lis

# import specific module or function
from lis import safe_or
```

## Tests

python -m pytest tests -s
